content: this design was originally born on the eve before the full moon of may 2023 - the flower moon this full moon landed on the 5th day of the 5th month and this pattern is based around the number 5 to celebrate this relationship the mandala pattern flowed from me needing to be brought forth this pattern is an expansion of my flower moon mandala pattern evolved into a beanie can you spot the sneaky turtle/tortoise in the centre of the design
